form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mrs. Fischer introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

form.official-title: To amend the Consumer Financial Protection Act of 2010 to strengthen the review authority of the Financial Stability Oversight Council of regulations issued by the Bureau of Consumer Financial Protection, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the CFPB Improvement Act of 2014.
Section 1023(c)(3)(A) of the Consumer Financial Protection Act of 2010 (12 U.S.C. 5513(c)(3)(A)) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking 2/3 and inserting a majority; and
by inserting before the period the following: , excluding the Director.

section.text: Section 1023 of the Consumer Financial Protection Act of 2010 (12 U.S.C. 5513) is amended—

subparagraph.text: by striking may and inserting shall; and

by striking regulation or provision would put the safety and soundness of the United States banking system or the stability of the financial system of the United States at risk and inserting regulation that is the subject of the petition is inconsistent with the safe and sound operations of United States financial institutions; and

in paragraph (3)(B)(ii), by striking would put the safety and soundness of the United States banking system or the stability of the financial system of the United States at risk and inserting is inconsistent with the safe and sound operations of United States financial institutions;
by redesignating paragraphs (6), (7), and (8) as paragraphs (5), (6), and (7), respectively.

section.text: Section 1022(b)(2)(A) of the Consumer Financial Protection Act of 2010 (12 U.S.C. 5512(b)(2)(A)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in clause (i), by striking and at the end;
in clause (ii), by adding and at the end; and
by adding at the end the following:

clause.text: the impact of such rule on the financial safety or soundness of an insured depository institution;
